titleStmt.title: Directions for the education of a young prince till seven years of age : which will serve for the governing of children of all conditions / translated out of French.
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Peter, 1601-1684.

notesStmt.note: Frontispiece portrait of William, Prince of Orange.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
